moves.name: Silver Wind
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Scurry Ahead!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense. Drastically raises the user’s Speed.

passives.name: Speeding Sun 2
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is sunny.

passives.name: Swag Bag 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of raising stat values with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: On a Roll 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.

grid.bonus: X Sp. Atk:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Bug Buzz:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Silver Wind:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Silver Wind:Unfortuitous 9- Lowers the target’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness at random when an attack is successful.
Scurry Ahead!:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
On a Roll 1- Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.
On a Roll 1- Raises the chance of lowering stat values with the additional effects of moves.
Solar Shield- The Pokémon is not affected by status conditions when the weather is sunny.
Fortuitous 1- Has a small chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness at random when an attack is successful.
Solar Flare 5- Powers up sync moves when the weather is sunny.
Healing Sun 1- Restores the Pokémon’s HP whenever it takes an action while the weather is sunny.
Swag Bag 1- Raises the chance of raising stat values with the additional effects of moves.
Swag Bag 1- Raises the chance of raising stat values with the additional effects of moves.
Grand Entry 1- Raises the user’s Sp. Atk when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Charging Sun 5- Powers up moves when the weather is sunny.
Trip Wire 1- Lowers the Speed of all opposing sync pairs when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Smarty-Pants- The more the target’s Sp. Def is lowered, the more it powers up sync moves.
Befuddle 1- Lowers the Sp. Def of all opposing sync pairs when the Pokémon enters a battle.
